data.name: LeftRightMarginScale
desc: specifies a left and right margin.

properties.name: TextLeft
desc: specifies a left text margin in 1/100th mm.

properties.name: Left
desc: specifies a left margin in 1/100th mm.

properties.name: Right
desc: specifies a right margin in 1/100th mm.

properties.name: FirstLine
desc: specifies a first line indent relative to TextLeft in 1/100th mm.

properties.name: ScaleLeft
desc: specifies a scale value for the left margin in percent.

properties.name: ScaleRight
desc: specifies a scale value for the right margin in percent.

properties.name: ScaleFirstLine
desc: specifies a scale value for the first line margin in percent.

properties.name: AutoFirstLine
desc: specifies if the automatic calculation of the first line indent occurs.
